sen.e: Tensho Ken-o Shonen Shisetsu is the mission of the four boys and others dispatched to Rome in 1582, acted for Yoshishige OTOMO, Sumitada OMURA, and Harunobu ARIMA, who were the Christian feudal lords in Kyushu.
